Package System

Class UI

java.lang.Object
System.UI
public class UI
extends java.lang.Object
Class: java.System.UI Prints the menus and the results of running each of the options

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    UI()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void printErrorCoordinates()
    prints an error when the user enters wrong coordinates
    static void printErrorLocationNameExists()
    prints error when the user creates a new location with an already existing name
    static void printErrorMenu()
    prints an error when the user enteres an invalid option in the menu
    static void printErrorNoStationsThisYear()
    prints an error when the user search for the subway stations inaugurated in their birth year bu they don't find nay
    static void printFavLocationTypeError()
    prints an error message when the user enters a wrong type for the favorite location other than hte ones specified in the question message
    static void printFavStationAndStopsError()
    prints when the user asks to show the stations and stops around them before they assign any favorite locations
    static void printFavStopsAndStations​(User user, FavLocation favLoc, boolean print)
    prints all the stations and stops that are within 0.5Km radios from the users specified favorite location
    static void printInfoValidMessage()
    prints a message when the user enters all their information correctly
    static void printInputErrorYN()
    prints an error whe the user is asked to enter (yes/no) but they enter something different
    static void printLocationHistory​(java.util.ArrayList<Location> LocationHistory)
    prints all the locations that the user has searched for using option 2 (Search locations)
    static void printMainMenu()
    prints the main menu
    static void printMyLocationOption​(java.util.ArrayList<Location> locations)
    prints all the locations the user has created
    static void printMyRoutes​(java.util.ArrayList<Route> myRoutes)
    print all the routes that the user have planned before
    static void printOption1Menu()
    prints the User Management menu
    static void printRoute​(Route route)
    prints the best route after selecting it form the different routes the api returns.
    static void printRouteDestArrivalError()
    prints an error message when the user enters a wrong character while specifying the information of the route the want to plan
    static void printRouteLocationError()
    prints an error message when the users try set the origin or the destination of a route to a location that is not registered in the system
    static void printSearchedLocation​(Location location)
    prints the information of the specific location the user has searched for.
    static void printStationsInaugurated​(java.util.ArrayList<Station> stations, int year)
    prints the stations that were built on the same year as the user's birth year they entered when logging into the program
    static void printWaitTime​(java.lang.String stopId, java.util.ArrayList<Line> lines, User user)
    prints the waiting time for all the bus lines that stop at the specified stop.
    static void printWelcomeMessage()
    prints the welcome message when you lunch the program

    • printMyLocationOption

      public static void printMyLocationOption​(java.util.ArrayList<Location> locations)
      prints all the locations the user has created
      Parameters:
      locations - contains all the locations created by the user

    • printLocationHistory

      public static void printLocationHistory​(java.util.ArrayList<Location> LocationHistory)
      prints all the locations that the user has searched for using option 2 (Search locations)
      Parameters:
      LocationHistory - contain all the locations the user searched for ordered according to the time in which the user searched for them.

    • printSearchedLocation

      public static void printSearchedLocation​(Location location)
      prints the information of the specific location the user has searched for.
      Parameters:
      location - the location the user is searching for

    • printRoute

      public static void printRoute​(Route route)
      prints the best route after selecting it form the different routes the api returns. this method uses another method in the Route class
      Parameters:
      route - all the possible routes offered by API to go from the origin to the destination
      See Also:
      Route

    • printMyRoutes

      public static void printMyRoutes​(java.util.ArrayList<Route> myRoutes)
      print all the routes that the user have planned before
      Parameters:
      myRoutes - contains all the information about the routes the user has planned before.

    • printFavStopsAndStations

      public static void printFavStopsAndStations​(User user, FavLocation favLoc, boolean print)
      prints all the stations and stops that are within 0.5Km radios from the users specified favorite location
      Parameters:
      user - the user that is currently logged in the program
      favLoc - the favorite location you want to print the stations and stops around
      print - specifies wither there is any stations and stops around the specified favorite location. it takes the value 'true' if the specified location has stops and stations around it and we have to print them, and takes the value 'false' if the specified location doesn't have any stations and stops around it so we don't have to print any thing, and we should show a message saying so.

    • printStationsInaugurated

      public static void printStationsInaugurated​(java.util.ArrayList<Station> stations, int year)
      prints the stations that were built on the same year as the user's birth year they entered when logging into the program
      Parameters:
      stations - all the stations that were built on the specified year returned by the API
      year - the year in which the user was born

    • printWaitTime

      public static void printWaitTime​(java.lang.String stopId, java.util.ArrayList<Line> lines, User user)
      prints the waiting time for all the bus lines that stop at the specified stop. Moreover, it will print the Lines ordered by the waiting time, so the line with the least amount of time left will print first
      Parameters:
      stopId - the code of the stop we are interested in knowing the information about
      lines - all the lines that stop at the specified stop
      user - the information of the currently logged in user
